name: Caroline's Garden
summary: Caroline's Garden is a story driven game in which Nano, a young gardener, has to help Caroline to grow the most beautiful flowers and sell them for a profit. Trying to win the Alun Alun flower festival is a challenging side quest and it is vital to keep developing new types of flowers by doing research and gathering information down the pub (always a good place to come up with a great idea afterall). Unlock new gardens as you go along and keep an eye on your energy and nutrition values while you work hard to complete each mission.
